scripts.indexer: cd apps/indexer && pnpm install && pnpm run dev
scripts.dashboard: cd apps/dashboard && pnpm install && pnpm run dev
scripts.v4:deploy: cd contracts && source .env && export ETH_FROM=$(cast wallet address --private-key $PK) && forge script script/01_DeployAndSave.s.sol --rpc-url $UNICHAIN_RPC --private-key $PK --broadcast --legacy --ffi -vvv
scripts.v4:pool: cd contracts && source .env && export ETH_FROM=$(cast wallet address --private-key $PK) && forge script script/02_CreatePool.s.sol --rpc-url $UNICHAIN_RPC --private-key $PK --broadcast --legacy -vvv
scripts.v4:info: cd contracts && source .env && forge script script/03_ShowPoolInfo.s.sol --rpc-url $UNICHAIN_RPC -vvv
